review_text: Good guide for beginners.  Helpful resource.  Clear pictures and instructions.  If you can learn from just looking at a page on a book with a few written details, it will teach you without expensive classes.  But if you are using in addition to the class, all good too.  Keep it handy to look back at once in a while as a resource.
product_name: Wilton Decorating Cakes Book (The Wilton school)
